ModMetaData.name: [SS]Maid Project
ModMetaData.author: BJInternetSupervision
ModMetaData.description: Maid project. This mod has six different kinds of Maid costumes. Those maid costumes have their own bonus to different skills. Besides, one exclusive use working brench and one research are included in this mod. For the display of maid hats(show the hats and hair together), this mod has use the dll of "Isekawa_HatTricks"Mod by author"YouAllJilao"(with his permission). Update: Steam ID LingLuo
